About Hammock Bay
About Hammock Bay
Hammock Bay is a premier master-planned residential community along Highway 20, just 15 minutes north of the sugary white sand beaches of the Florida Panhandle and Scenic Highway 30A. Situated on 3,000 acres in Freeport, you will discover a peaceful, relaxing lifestyle while still close to everything in Northwest Florida.
Planned by the award-winning developers of Destiny by the Sea, Hammock Bay is a unique, sought-after, and environmentally responsible community that offers a one-of-a-kind lifestyle for residents of all ages. Particular care and thoughtful consideration have been demonstrated throughout every development step to ensure no detail is overlooked.
Ideally located near the beaches of South Walton, Destin, Niceville, major airports, and Eglin Air Force Base, discover what makes Hammock Bay so special. Tucked onto 3,000 acres in Freeport, Florida, Hammock Bay is a first-class residential development with unparalleled natural beauty. Hammock Bay is created with a contemporary vision from first-time homeowners to retirees while complementing the area’s natural resources.
Mission:
At
The Jay Odom Group
, our mission for Hammock Bay is to offer a premier residential development that provides a comfortable, convenient lifestyle with a wide array of amenities for all ages. Together, these add to a higher quality of life while creating a home and community that uplifts and enriches the human spirit.
Residents at Hammock Bay will enjoy a host of amenities, including onsite recreational activities, year-round social events, and a vibrant and active Town Center. With something for everyone, Hammock Bay strives to deliver a sense of community reminiscent of yesteryear.
Hammock Bay Has Many Neighborhoods in One!
Hammock Bay Has Many Amenities!

Home
Site Plan
Inquire
THE
STEAMBOAT LANDING
LIFESTYLE
Nature’s Bliss: Embrace the Tranquil 87 Acres of Choctawhatchee Bay Paradise
Embrace the Serenity:
Discover the tranquil embrace of our 87-acre haven, where the gentle waves of Choctawhatchee Bay lap at your senses. Immerse yourself in the untouched beauty of this lush haven.
A Symphony of Nature:
Nestled within, you’ll find three serene lakes, a rich landscape of natural vegetation, and a thriving habitat for pelicans and blue heron birds. Explore winding nature trails, go fishing, kayaking, paddleboarding, and bask in the breathtaking beauty of our sunsets.
Your Gateway to Natural Splendor:
Let nature be your guide as you embark on unforgettable nature walks and take in the boundless wonders of Steamboat Landing’s pristine surroundings.
Home
Site Plan
Inquire
Step into the Lap of Bayfront Luxury at Steamboat Landing’s New Clubhouse
Unveiling a Breathtaking Bayfront Retreat:
Nestled on the serene shores of Choctawhatchee Bay, our 8,300 sqft clubhouse is a breathtaking haven that beckons you. Picture yourself on our covered porches, gazing at panoramic vistas, or escaping to the screened porch—a tranquil nature retreat. Inside, cozy charm graces the parlor room, while the great room beckons gatherings.
Your Instant Access Pass:
Did you know that purchasing a homesite at Steamboat Landing grants you instant access to our spectacular amenities, including the clubhouse and bayfront dock, even before your custom home is built? Dive into bayfront luxury today!
The clubhouse is open to Hammock Bay residents now.
BUY YOUR HOMESITE NOW
Home
Site Plan
Inquire
HOMESITE
16
CUSTOM BUILD MODEL HOME

5-bed, 5-bath, 4,915 sqft
lakefront retreat in
Steamboat Landing.
Designed by developer
Jay Odom
and meticulously crafted by renowned builder
Randy Wise,
this home offers the finest in modern living.
With Wolf kitchen appliances, a sparkling pool, and a spacious four-car garage
, it’s a
dream come true.
